https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qd51RRscEvuDBtKx7EqfKA7fH7S.jpg Shankar, leader of a labour union, is killed by a mafia don. His son Munna, who is raised by the slum dwellers, is unaware of his past. However, his enemies identify him and attempt to kill him. Andhrawala
